title: Your Resource for Integrative Cancer Care - CancerChoices
description: CancerChoices is a free, science-informed resource, helping you make sense of your choices in integrative cancer care. Explore complementary therapies and more.
cleaned_text: Experience whole-person cancer care. An approach that empowers you to play an active role in your healing. And one that provides the best cancer treatments available through conventionalthe cancer care offered by conventionally trained physicians and most hospitals; examples are chemotherapy, surgery, and radiotherapy, complementaryin cancer care, complementary care involves the use of therapies intended to enhance or add to standard conventional treatments; examples include supplements, mind-body approaches such as yoga or psychosocial therapy, and acupuncture, and self carelifestyle actions and behaviors that may impact cancer outcomes; examples include eating health-promoting foods, limiting alcohol, increasing physical activity, and managing stress, synergistically. This is integrativein cancer care, a patient-centered approach combining the best of conventional care, self care, and evidence-informed complementary care in an integrated plan cancer care. We are here to guide you. Whole-person healing Transform your experience of living with cancer through the practice of integrative care. Informed therapy choices Explore trusted, science-backed reviews of complementary therapies. Self care in action Take an active role in promoting your healing and wellness. Conversations with experts Discover information and views from leaders in integrative oncology. Specialized guidance Find curated information specific to your situation. The support you need Join a circle, meet a peer guide, or read personal stories. An integrative approach offers tools to target your cancer while improving your overall health and quality of life. Stay informed and supported through every step of your integrative healing journey.
